plot: The story of three people who are about to attend a wedding, all of which have different reasons for not wanting to be there, the flower girl, the priest, and the groom.
title: The Wedding
plot_es: The story of three people who are about to attend a wedding, all of which have different reasons for not wanting to be there, the flower girl, the priest, and the groom.
plot_en: The story of three people who are about to attend a wedding, all of which have different reasons for not wanting to be there, the flower girl, the priest, and the groom.
